title: Cup And Saucer
markings: (a, cup) Iron red eight pointed star in overlgaze on base, off center. (b, saucer) Red five point star underglaze on base, off center.
dimensions:
(a) H x diam.: 2 x 11.4 cm (13/16 x 4 1/2 in.)
(b) H x W x D: 6 x 7.6 x 7 cm (2 3/8 in. x 3 in. x 2 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of George B. and Georgiana L. McClellan
description: With green and gold flower and sprig decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer.
porcelain. Gift of George B. and Georgiana L. McClellan. 1936-13-22-a,b.
